dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-cached-property
dependencies.description: A decorator for caching properties in classes.

dependencies.name: py-coloredlogs
dependencies.description: Colored terminal output for Python's logging module

dependencies.name: py-cryptography
dependencies.description:
cryptography is a package which provides cryptographic recipes and
primitives to Python developers

dependencies.name: py-maestrowf
dependencies.description:
A general purpose workflow conductor for running multi-step simulation
studies.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: py-parse
dependencies.description: parse() is the opposite of format()

dependencies.name: py-psutil
dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.
